fields.title: What is the answer to the meaning of life, the universe, and everything?
fields.body: I think this is a pop culture reference but I don't get it.

fields.title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish?
fields.body: Can someone please explain this reference from "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy"?

fields.title: ELI5: Don't Panic in THGTTG
fields.body: Saw that Elon Musk referenced this phrase in his Tesla Roadster. May I know its meaning in The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy?
It is the message left by the dolphins when they departed Planet Earth just before it was demolished to make way for a hyperspace bypass.
It's the title of the fourth book in the series.
This is a comedy, the phrase, as used there, is to signify that Dolphins are more intelligent than humans.
